content: Like the two Frog Guai before him, Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang is a formidable foe with surprising reach, and if you thought you'd seen everything a frog boss could do, you're sadly in for a surprise. Much as Chapter 2's frog boss was imbued with lightning attacks, so too does this boss have the power of ice on his side, and unless you take precautions, you'll be frozen solid and out of stamina -- unable to move while you're torn to pieces.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang.md', within the main section titled 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang' and the sub-subsection 'Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Like the two Frog Guai before him, Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang is a formidable foe with surprising reach, and if you thought you'd seen everything a frog boss could do, you're sadly in for a surprise. Much as Chapter 2's frog boss was imbued with lightning attacks, so too does this boss have the power of ice on his side, and unless you take precautions, you'll be frozen solid and out of stamina -- unable to move while you're torn to pieces.
